title: So Riot Lyte is allowed to call people scumbags for being scumbags
body:
But we're not allowed to call people scumbags for being scumbags?

That's a wicked double standard right there plus he's like head social analyst for Riot games and can't even control his tongue when he is a person of authority and respect but we're expected to when we're the petty bottom dwellers?

Poor effort by Lyte in maintaining respect among the league when he refers derogoratorily to people and uses an insulting and offensive term rather than a descriptive one and we're expected to not use the same derogaratory terms for people that annoy, aggravate and upset us?

replies.body: it's because he has a PhD and we don't.
Who says I don't have a PhD?
Delivering source was avoided, assume fake and troll.

No I just couldn't find the post he made on NA about a year ago because there are about 300 thousand Lyte related posts. He did post that they were and I quote "scumbags" referring to int feeders, ban worthy people etc.

Its all a matter of authority, the president of the USA can drop a nuclear bomb wherever he wants, but if i did that (assuming i had one) id be imprisoned/executed immediately. We are not all equal, so we shouldn't pretend like we are allowed to do the same things.

Yeah I guess you're right. Just every time I get toxic people in game I remember what he said and it annoys me because he's taking jabs at them but we're not allowed to take jabs at each other... Such a double standard.
